title: The Great Indian Kapil Show
description: Comedian Kapil Sharma brings desi fun to an all-new season featuring celebrity guests, side-splitting gags and a dash of classic Indian charm.

title: Don't Come Home
description: A mother must confront dark secrets from the past when her young daughter mysteriously vanishes after they move into her family’s eerie old mansion.

title: Murder Mindfully
description: When mafia lawyer Björn attends a mindfulness class to find a better work-life balance, he discovers surprising new coping strategies — including murder.

title: Fabulous Lives vs Bollywood Wives
description: It’s Bombay vs. Delhi in this season as the crème de la crème of Bollywood women face off with the glamorous jet-setters of the capital city.

title: The Diplomat
description: When a London bombing shatters her world, US diplomat Kate Wyler faces the ultimate test as her suspicions reach the top levels of the British government.

title: The Lincoln Lawyer
description: Mickey takes on a personal and potentially dangerous case when he defends the person accused of murdering Gloria Dayton, his friend and former client.

title: IC814 The Kandahar Hijack
description: When IC 814 gets hijacked on its way to Delhi, hundreds of lives are at stake as the country faces its longest and most alarming aviation crisis.

title: Bank Under Siege
description: Spain, 1981: When armed men hold up a bank and take hundreds hostage, a reporter races against the authorities to uncover the true motive for the heist.

title: Outer Banks
description: The Pogues return home and start living their best life, but it's not long before they're back to doing what they do best: hunting for treasure.
